TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Format extends System.Enum

summary.span: 由 和 使用，以指示使用者定義型別 (UDT) 或彙總 (Aggregate) 的序列化 (Serialization) 格式。

span.span: Used by and to indicate the serialization format of a user-defined type (UDT) or aggregate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 和 使用，以指示使用者定義型別 (UDT) 或彙總 (Aggregate) 的序列化 (Serialization) 格式。Used by and to indicate the serialization format of a user-defined type (UDT) or aggregate. ## Examples 下列範例所示`UserDefinedType`Point UDT 的屬性。The following example shows the `UserDefinedType` attribute of the Point UDT. UDT 是位元組排序、 名為 「 點 」，具有名為"ValidatePoint 」，驗證方法和使用原生序列化格式。The UDT is byte-ordered, is named "Point", has a validation method named "ValidatePoint", and uses the native serialization format. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format Native = int32(1)

summary.span: 序列化格式使用非常簡單的演算法，可讓 SQL Server 在磁碟上儲存 UDT 的有效表示。

span.span: The serialization format uses a very simple algorithm that enables SQL Server to store an efficient representation of the UDT on disk.

summary.span: 標記為 序列化的型別只能具有實值型別 (Microsoft Visual C# 中的結構 (Struct) 和 Microsoft Visual Basic .NET 中的結構 (Structure)) 做為成員。

span.span: Types marked for serialization can only have value types (structs in Microsoft Visual C# and structures in Microsoft Visual Basic .NET) as members.

summary.span: 不支援參考型別的成員 (例如，Visual C# 和 Visual Basic 中的類別 (Class))，無論是使用者定義的還是框架中現有的成員 (例如 )。

span.span: Members of reference types (such as classes in Visual C# and Visual Basic), either user-defined or those existing in the framework (such as ), are not supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式的需求如下：The requirements for this format are: - `StructLayout.LayoutKindSequential`屬性必須套用至彙總或 UDT，如果已定義類別而非以結構中。The `StructLayout.LayoutKindSequential` attribute must be applied to the aggregate or UDT if it is defined in a class and not a structure. 這會控制資料欄位的實際配置和用來強制執行循序配置它們出現的順序中的成員。This controls the physical layout of the data fields, and is used to force the members to be laid out sequentially in the order they appear. SQL Server 會使用這個屬性來判斷之 Udt 的欄位順序與多個欄位。SQL Server uses this attribute to determine the field order for UDTs with multiple fields. - 類型必須包含至少一個成員 （序列化的值不能是零個位元組大小）。The type must contain at least one member (serialized values cannot be zero bytes in size). - 彙總的所有欄位都必須都是*blittable*，也就是說，它們必須在 managed 和 unmanaged 記憶體中有常見的表示法，而且不需要特殊處理，interop 封送處理器。All the fields of the aggregate must be *blittable*, that is, they must have a common representation in both managed and unmanaged memory and not require special handling by the interop marshaler. - UDT 的所有欄位都必須是可以序列化下列類型之一： `bool`， `byte`， `sbyte`， `short`， `ushort`， `int`， `uint`， `long`， `ulong`， `float``double`， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，或其他實值類型由使用者定義包含欄位的下列其中一種型別。All the fields of the UDT should be of one of the following types that can be serialized: `bool`, `byte`, `sbyte`, `short`, `ushort`, `int`, `uint`, `long`, `ulong`, `float`, `double`, , , , , , , , , or other value types defined by the user that contain fields of one of these types. - 彙總不可以指定的值`MaxByteSize`。The aggregate must not specify a value for `MaxByteSize`. - 彙總必須沒有任何 [因此] 欄位。The aggregate must not have any [NonSerialized] fields. - 欄位不能標示為明確的配置 ()。Fields must not be marked as an explicit layout ().

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format Unknown = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format UserDefined = int32(2)

summary.span: 序列化格式透過 和 方法，為開發人員提供對二進位格式的完全控制。

span.span: The serialization format gives the developer full control over the binary format through the and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 彙總都必須指定值`MaxByteSize`。The aggregate must specify a value for `MaxByteSize`. 指定屬性內容。Specify the attribute property. 預設值為 false。The default value is false. 如果您省略任何欄位中的或則不會序列化方法，該欄位的狀態。If you omit any field in the or methods, the state of that field is not serialized.
